about_the_game:
With this Show DLC for Clip Maker you will get 4 complete scene for making excellent videos, films and clips.

All content of this DLC (switching between scenes) will be available directly from the game, in the "Esc" menu where you are making settings of the whole game.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
detailed_description:
With this Show DLC for Clip Maker you will get 4 complete scene for making excellent videos, films and clips.

All content of this DLC (switching between scenes) will be available directly from the game, in the "Esc" menu where you are making settings of the whole game.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
name: Show for Clip maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Show for Clip Maker - have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips and videos. Specially created for amateurs and artists to bring your stories to life.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
